name: Intro
description: These are meant for non-majors or potential majors to dabble in the field of computing

name: Core
description: These classes are required core classes that most electives build on

name: Upper Core
description: These are harder required upper core classes

name: Electives
description: These are electives! Take what interest you

name: Capstone
description: These classes aim to force you to get real world expierence through internships, team projects, or internships

name: Masters
description: It is possible for undergrads to take these courses with special permission from the department
